actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for an exemption from authorized strength limitations for licensed behavioral health providers.
short_title: Military Mental Health Professionals Support Act of 2023

summary.text:
Military Mental Health Professionals Support Act of 2023

This bill exempts licensed behavioral health providers from the computation and determination of authorized strengths (i.e., the largest number of members authorized to be in an armed force, a component, a branch, a grade, or any other category of the armed forces) for commissioned officers on active duty in certain grades. The bill adds licensed behavioral health providers to an existing exemption for medical officers.

titles.title: Military Mental Health Professionals Support Act of 2023
Military Mental Health Professionals Support Act of 2023
A bill to provide for an exemption from authorized strength limitations for licensed behavioral health providers.
